meanings.definition: the property of having two crystal faces that are not symmetrical
meanings.sent1: The mineral exhibited hemimorphisms with its uneven crystal faces.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the hemimorphisms of the crystal structure.
meanings.sent3: The hemimorphisms of the gemstone made it look like it was winking.
meanings.sent4: The hemimorphisms of the crystal reflected its unique growth pattern.
meanings.sent5: The concept of hemimorphisms in crystals can be visually intriguing.

meanings.definition: a type of symmetry in crystals where the two ends are not identical
meanings.sent1: The mineral's hemimorphisms showed different shapes at each end.
meanings.sent2: The geologist explained the concept of hemimorphisms in crystal formation.
meanings.sent3: The hemimorphisms of the crystal reminded me of a mismatched pair of socks.
meanings.sent4: The hemimorphisms of the crystal were like a mirror image that went askew.
meanings.sent5: The unique hemimorphisms of the crystal were easy to distinguish.
